name: Burgers Hub
title: Burgers Hub

api_list.name: Burgers
api_list.description: This endpoint returns all the burgers
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://burgers-hub.p.rapidapi.com/burgers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "burgers-hub.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://burgers-hub.p.rapidapi.com/burgers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "burgers-hub.p.rapidapi.com"

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
